```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
load("disag.rda")
```

```{r}
pltAIG <- ggplot(dfEOG, aes(PctAIG, pct_glp)) + geom_point()
pltAIG
```

```{r}
fitEOG_AIG <- glm(data = dfEOG
                     , pct_glp ~ 1 + PctAIG
                     , family = binomial)
summary(fitEOG_AIG)

dfEOG$PredictAIG <- predict(fitEOG_AIG, type = "response")

pltAIG <- pltAIG + geom_line(aes(PctAIG, PredictBinom), color = "red")
pltAIG
```
